page.title: 12HOUSING (continued)
page.content: Different colours have been used for the bricks of the buildings helping to add variety. Some of the houses have no chimneys, being built purposely for central heating.The new housing in Tilehurst area follows the modern trend of being built in small cul_de_sacs,each leading from a larger distribution road.The distribution road has few if any houses on it.Clusters of garage complexes help to serve the small terraces,whilst the Detatched and emi_Detatched houses each have their own garages. Small green areas are interspersed amongst the cul_de_sacs as safe places in which children can play.
